title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw:
Dear all,

We are migrating the REEM humanoid robot simulation (https://github.com/pal-robotics/reem_simulation) to gazebo 1.5 with ROS Fuerte and Ubuntu 12.04. We have encountered some problems with the simulation of a monocular camera. Concretely, we are using the **libgazebo_ros_camera.so** plugin to simulate the camera. The 'image' topic is correctly published. However, the **'camera_info'** topic is not published. Both topics appear are listed with 'rostopic list', but the 'camera_info' topic does not respond when doing for instance 'rostopic hz <camera_info topic name>'

Can you check if the plugin is working properly?

Thanks in advance

Jordi
